Text.Page:
Imps. They must be the most annoying little buggers on the planet. The Thulsans threaten the future of the federation, and the imps are a potentially fatal distraction. We can't afford to take our eye off the ball.

Please eliminate the fiesty ebon imps and bring me their teeth. We'll make necklaces out of them or something. It'll be good for morale.
Thank you, <PCNAME>. With the imps under control, we can give our undivided attention to defeating the Thulsan army.

The imps are still around.

Please hunt them down and rid us of the nuisance.
